name: Paint Paint
description:
Complete the great works of Piet Mondriaan in 30 seconds, using the only tool any great artist needs - a very pixelated brush.

Controls:
W - jump
A/D - move
S - drop down
Q/E - change paint colour
Space - toggle paint on/off

A game made for Paint Jam 2020 in 48 hours (which was unfortunately not quite enough time to implement the third level).

Challenges done:

  • Draw your assets without a drawing tablet.
  • Try to make the title/logo without any real type/font.

Tableau I by Piet Mondriaan, copied in Paint by me.
